about_the_game: This is the playable demo for Covid Carl.  It is the first 2 levels and bosses of the game.
detailed_description: This is the playable demo for Covid Carl.  It is the first 2 levels and bosses of the game.
name: Covid Carl Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want to hear the sounds. Don't expect anything spectacular though.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want to hear the sounds. Don't expect anything spectacular though.

short_description: This is the playable demo for Covid Carl. It is the first 2 levels and bosses of the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
